attributes.action: Stop the TV Licensing Authority threatening those who have no television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TV Licensing sends regular accusatory and threatening letters to all who have no licence.  However, many people have no licence because they have no television reception.  We petition the Prime Minister to support the right of those who do not receive television signals to do so without being hounded.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the TV Licensing Authority threatening those who have no television."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11994.asp
